title: Italian pork sausages
ingredients: ['4kg pork shoulder, cut into cubes', '3 tablespoons garlic granules', '4 tablespoons fennel seeds', '2 tablespoons crushed chillies', '4 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '125ml dry white wine', '4.5 metres (3.75cm) diameter hog casings, rinsed']
